Class Kiva

  • java.lang.Object
    • Kiva

  • public class Kiva
extends java.lang.Object
    The Kiva class allows a Kiva robot object to navigate a map to pick up and drop pods.
    See Also:
    KivaCommand, FloorMap

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean carryingPod 
      (package private) boolean debugging 
      (package private) boolean successfullyDropped 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Kiva()
      Creates Kiva using a default floor map from KivaCreateMap
      Kiva(FloorMap map)
      Creates Kiva using a provided map
      Kiva(FloorMap map, Point currentLocation)
      Creates Kiva using a user provided map and a defined Kiva location.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Point getCurrentLocation()
      Returns the current Kiva location as an edu.duke.Point object.
      (package private) FacingDirection getDirectionFacing()
      Returns the current Kiva facing direction, UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT.
      long getMotorLifetime()
      Returns the current motor lifetime (Long, in milliseconds) Max lifetime is 4320000000000 ms (20,000 Hours)
      boolean isCarryingPod()
      Returns true if Kiva has successfully picked up a pod and has not dropped it yet.
      boolean isSuccessfullyDropped()
      Returns true if Kiva has successfully dropped off a pod.
      void move(KivaCommand command)
      Moves the Kiva FORWARD, turn RIGHT, turn LEFT, TAKE a pod, DROP a pod
      (package private) void setDirectionFacing(java.lang.String facingDirection)
      Sets the direction facing without executing a RIGHT_TURN or LEFT_TURN.
      void setMotorLifetime(long motorLifetime)
      Sets the motor lifetime of the current Kiva.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentLocation

        Point getCurrentLocation()
        Returns the current Kiva location as an edu.duke.Point object.

        Example usage: 

             Kiva kiva = new Kiva();
     kiva.move(KivaCommand.FORWARD);
     System.out.println("The Kiva is at location ("
         + kiva.getCurrentLocation().getX() + ", "
         + kiva.getCurrentLocation().getY() + ").");
        Returns:
        edu.duke Point
        See Also:
        Point

      • getDirectionFacing

        FacingDirection getDirectionFacing()
        Returns the current Kiva facing direction, UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT.

        Example usage: 

             Kiva kiva = new Kiva();
     kiva.move(KivaCommand.TURN_LEFT);
     System.out.println("The Kiva is facing " + kiva.getDirectionFacing());
        Returns:
        KivaWorld FacingDirection: UP, RIGHT, DOWN,
        See Also:
        FacingDirection

      • getMotorLifetime

        public long getMotorLifetime()
        Returns the current motor lifetime (Long, in milliseconds) Max lifetime is 4320000000000 ms (20,000 Hours)
        Returns:
        Long motor lifetime in milliseconds

      • isCarryingPod

        public boolean isCarryingPod()
        Returns true if Kiva has successfully picked up a pod and has not dropped it yet.
        Returns:
        true if Kiva has successfully picked up a pod.

      • isSuccessfullyDropped

        public boolean isSuccessfullyDropped()
        Returns true if Kiva has successfully dropped off a pod.
        Returns:
        true if Kiva has successfully dropped off a pod.

      • move

        public void move(KivaCommand command)
        Moves the Kiva FORWARD, turn RIGHT, turn LEFT, TAKE a pod, DROP a pod

        Example usage: 

             Kiva kiva = new Kiva();
     kiva.move(KivaCommand.TURN_LEFT);
     kiva.move(KivaCommand.FORWARD);
     kiva.move(KivaCommand.TAKE);
        Parameters:
        command - KivaCommand command
        Throws:
        NoPodException - if Kiva attempts to TAKE a pod where there is none.
        IllegalDropZoneException - if Kiva attempts to drop a pod outside the drop zone.
        See Also:
        KivaCommand

      • setDirectionFacing

        void setDirectionFacing(java.lang.String facingDirection)
        Sets the direction facing without executing a RIGHT_TURN or LEFT_TURN.
        Parameters:
        facingDirection - The facingDirection to set the Kiva to.
        See Also:
        FacingDirection

      • setMotorLifetime

        public void setMotorLifetime(long motorLifetime)
        Sets the motor lifetime of the current Kiva. Used for testing.
        Parameters:
        motorLifetime - current motor lifetime (Long, in milliseconds) Max lifetime is 4320000000000 ms (20,000 Hours)
